Title: Gates Foundation urges govt to boost health financing for NCDs in Nigeria
Summary: Gates Foundation urges govt to boost health financing for NCDs in Nigeria . The foundation recalled that in 2024, it committed $8.6 billion to global healthcare .

Title: Tinubu seeks total elimination of nuclear weapons
Summary: Tinubu made the call while delivering Nigeria’s statement at the high-level meeting to commemorate the International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons .

Title: Conflicts: Tinubu urges AU to renew focus on diplomacy
Summary: Tinubu made the call during a meeting of the AU Peace and Security Council . He urged the African Union to reinvigorate diplomacy as the primary and most effective means of conflict resolution in Africa .

Title: Ikorodu Bois transcend Ikorodu streets to global stage
Summary: Multi-talented group of young creatives had to turn everyday life into a springboard for global fame . Known as the Ikorodu Bois, the trio of siblings and their siblings transcend the streets to global stage .

Title: Northern CAN leader Hayab cautions against religious persecution
Summary: Reverend John Joseph Hayab has warned that sustained religious persecution poses a serious threat to Nigeria’s moral fabric, unity, and unity . Reverend Hayab is the Chairman of the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) for the 19 Northern States and the Federal Capital Territory (FCT)

Title: French govt bans Ajax fans from Marseille for Champions League game
Summary: French govt bans Ajax fans from Marseille for Champions League game . The decree also states that "Ajax Amsterdam's travel is very frequently a source of public disorder"

Title: Protesters demand answers 11 years after Mexican students vanished
Summary: Delfina de la Cruz vented frustration at the unsolved disappearances of 43 Mexican students . 43 students allegedly kidnapped by drug traffickers while authorities turned a blind eye .

Title: Trump targets more opponents after ‘dirty cop’ Comey
Summary: US President Donald Trump called Friday for more of his political opponents to face criminal charges . He cheered the indictment of former FBI director James Comey and branded him a "dirty cop" Trump targets more opponents after ‘dirty cop’ Comey .

Title: Drones fly over Denmark’s biggest military base
Summary: Unidentified drones were observed during the night over Denmark’s biggest military base . It is the latest in a slew of sightings that Danish officials have called a ‘hybrid attack’ The mystery drone observations have prompted the closure of several airports across the Scandinavian country .

Title: In-depth research now proves size matters!
Summary: Scientists from King’s College in London measured 15,000 penises in 16 countries . In-depth research now proves size matters!
